Question
========
An apple is falling straight down toward the ground. Take the weight of the apple to
be the action force. What is the reaction force?


Answerlist
----------
* There is no reaction force because the apple is not touching anything.
* The force of impact when the object hits the ground.
* The air resistance pushing up on the apples.
* The apple's gravity pulling upward on the Earth.


Solution
========
The apple applies an equal and opposite gravitational pull on the Earth.
